Detailed Description

Board INA226 specific data to measure power from the target.

Function Documentation

uint8_t PmhalIna226GetI2cAddress ( pmhalPrcmPmicRegulatorId_t  voltDomId)

Find the I2C address which corresponds to the voltage domain ID.

Parameters
voltDomIdVoltage Domain ID for which the value needs to be found. Refer pmhalPrcmPmicRegulatorId_t enum for valid values.
Returns
i2cAddr I2C address corresponding to the INA226 for the given voltage domain.
uint32_t PmhalIna226GetShuntRes ( pmhalPrcmPmicRegulatorId_t  voltDomId)

Find the shunt resistance which corresponds to the voltage domain ID.

Parameters
voltDomIdVoltage Domain ID for which the value needs to be found. Refer pmhalPrcmPmicRegulatorId_t enum for valid values.
Returns
shuntRes Shunt resistance corresponding to the INA226 for the given voltage domain.
